Source.Name: numpy
Source.Summary: array processing for numbers, strings, records, and objects in Python
Source.Description: NumPy is an array-processing package for Python designed to efficiently manipulate large multi-dimensional arrays of arbitrary records without the sacrifice of speed. It is built on the Numeric code base.

Package.Name: numpy
Package.Summary: array processing for numbers, strings, records, and objects in Python
Package.Description: NumPy is an array-processing package for Python designed to efficiently manipulate large multi-dimensional arrays of arbitrary records without the sacrifice of speed. It is built on the Numeric code base.
